attributes.action: Give BTEC Year 13 Students Predicted Grades Like A level Students
attributes.additional_details: It is easy to predict the overall grade a Btec student should receive due to continuous assessment over the two years. Our final grades will be affected because we’re in lockdown and can’t have help from teachers. Therefore we should receive predicted grades like other students.
attributes.background: A level students aren’t taking exams this year and will receive predicted grades. It’s not fair that Btec students have to create big final pieces of coursework with the same lack of teaching due to lockdowns.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow teacher predicted grades for BTEC students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548778

Cancel Vocational Exams NOW: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565615
